name: Battle Pigs
description:
Battle Pigs is a classic 2D action-platformer with challenging platforming, deadly obstacles and a charming theme. 

Battle on multiple levels through the deadly farm to save your familly from a pack of wolves. 

Overcome this ultimate challenge to become the champion you were meant to be.

THIS IS AN EARLY ALPHA VERSION, BUGS MAY APPEAR AND CHANGES MAY OCCUR IN THE FUTURE!

GAME CONTROLS:

If you have any feedback please let us know!

https://forms.gle/tXHoEfUYZKHwCu9E8

Thank you for playing!!!
